mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myuser ( user_email, pass_word, real_name, company_name, job, head_img_url) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{companyName}, #{job}, #{headImgUrl});
INSERT INTO user_link_conference (user_email, conference_name, orderId, statue) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{conferenceName}, #{orderId}, #{statue});
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_email AS userEmail, pass_word AS password, real_name AS realName, company_name AS companyName, job, head_img_url AS headImgUrl FROM myuser WHERE user_email = #{userEmail};

SELECT id, user_email AS userEmail, pass_word AS password, real_name AS realName, company_name AS companyName, job, head_img_url AS headImgUrl FROM myuser WHERE real_name = #{realName} and pass_word=#{passWord};
mapper.update: UPDATE user_link_conference SET statue = #{statue} WHERE orderId = #{orderId};
